728755f-b.title: Richmond: Clove Road - Martling Avenue
728755f-b.text:
(1)
740 Clove Road, south of the S.W. corner of Martling Ave.,
whwwing the Actors' Home. It was formerly (1898-1887) the
residence of Colonel R. Penn Smith, and earlier (1874) the J.Dg
Gates residence. The dates refer to maps, on which the owners'
Mnames appear.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
Another view of the house as seen from the opposite direction.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(3)
A rear view of the Home as seen across Richmond Lake.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
